programme.title: Live International T20 Cricket
programme.desc: New Zealand v Australia. Coverage of the second T20 in the three-match series from Blake Park in Mount Maunganui. The hosts will be looking to improve on a record that has only seen them beat Australia in T20 internationals on just five ocassions since their first meeting in the format in 2005. The visitors have also won four of the last five T20 meetings between the two teams.
